text:
How is it going Superpath community?

I have been part of this incredible community for over a year now and have become friends with some of the smartest people. It’s crazy how much value we are getting from here. I’ve been working with some this community members, and after talking to some of the group members, I feel like a lot of people are having a hard time finding a perfect White Label SEO Partner that they can depend upon.

In our experience, most marketing agencies spend over 80+ hours every month doing SEO work for their clients. After they shake hands with us, they invest these 80+ hours in other aspects of the business, which results in massive growth. We primarily work with SEO Freelancers or Marketing agencies and help them scale at a rapid scale.

We offer the following services to our clients:

1. Traffic Projection Analysis
2. Competitive Analysis with Reports
3. Website Quality Audit
4. Content Audit
5. Page Level SEO Recommendations
6. Content Gap Analysis
7. Backlink Audit
8. Keyword Research for New & Existing Pages
9. Content Briefs Creation
10. Technical/On-Page SEO Audit & Implementation
11. Ahrefs & SEMRush Audit Fixes
12. Google My Business Audit & Optimization
13. Citations Creations (Niche + High-Quality Citations)
14. Google Analytics Auditing
15. Google Search Console & Bing Webmaster Issues Fixes
Take a look at what our clients have to say about our services:

David (Managed their On-Site & Technical SEO for Local SEO Clients): <https://youtu.be/RCPWyhoNTdE>

Phil (Managed his Lead Gen & Client’s On-Site/Technical SEO Work): <https://youtu.be/fTCsg-5RJ-0>

Ryan (Worked on Content Strategies, Technical Stuff & KW Research for B2B): <https://youtu.be/RF6SlD79m9E>

Ryan (Managed Full SEO Projects): <https://youtu.be/0OHPzTZznu0>

If you’d be willing to give us just 30 minutes of your time, we will show you how you can achieve better results with us. 

We are very easy to move in any process; besides the blueprint training process, we have our custom process to help our clients get a better ranking & more qualified leads.

Working with us, you’ll get a project manager to manage your clients, who can guide you on answering client questions, concerns, and feedback.

Let’s <https://calendly.com/jitender-ahlawat/30min|get on a call> and find out what works best for your agency.

text:
:fire:[TRADE]:fire:
I'm working on an article for a DR 80+ site. Topic: The Best Podcasts to follow in 2022; :radio:

I have a few favorite podcasts. I can include your podcast in the list if you're willing to return the favor.

Why this is a great deal for everyone with a podcast to get in a list?
1. You'll get a brand mention and a link to your site;
2. When someone else is creating such lists on that topic, they will check what's already written and they can pick up your blog again for their list.

text:
*SaaS Marketing Strategies and Content Database* 

I created a database of *marketing* *strategies* for a software company.

I started with broad overarching strategies, then focused on specific strategies related to the product. It lists the Type of Strategy (email, content, SEO, branding, etc.), the Impact Rating, and the Funnel level. You can adjust these to fit your product and audience.

It also links to a Tactics list. These are *actual marketing tasks* you're doing that relate to your strategy. You can also link each Tactic to the App Feature list so you can tie Strategy > Tactic > Your App Features together.

There's also a Content Marketing Database. This helps you keep track of your articles, videos, landing pages, lead magnets, and other content. It includes places for Distribution, Author, Keywords, and more.

I'm finalizing both as a template you can purchase for $79. (Templates are in Airtable)

If you're interested in getting a copy, fill out this form and I'll email you when it's ready!

:point_right: <https://airtable.com/shrpsgtvkJVbZ7GK2>

text:
In-house marketers and content writers lack one crucial element in their day-to-day jobs, and it’s making their lives much harder than it needs to be.

It boils down to one word: 

*Immersion.*

When you’re thoroughly immersed in your subject matter, words and ideas flow easily. You’re able to craft logical, coherent campaigns and content assets off the top of your head.

Here are 5 things you can do today to immerse yourself and become a better marketer or content writer – plus 5 ways marketing leaders can drive immersion in their teams: <https://mohammedshehu.com/2022/02/10/immersion-for-marketers-and-content-writers/>

attachments.fallback: Mohammed Shehu, PhD - B2B Content Marketer & Copywriter: Immersion: The hidden secret of expert content marketers
attachments.text: Immersion is the key to better campaigns and content. Here are 5 ways to immerse yourself in your field and become a better marketer or content writer.
attachments.title: Immersion: The hidden secret of expert content marketers
attachments.service_name: Mohammed Shehu, PhD - B2B Content Marketer & Copywriter

text:
The last one of a series of posts about *AB test analysis*, this article answers *questions we often get from our clients*, such as:

• _How are the experiment's results calculated?_ :thinking_face:
• _How is the best performing variant determined?_ :thinking_face:
• _How is the length of an experiment defined?_ :thinking_face:
Check this walkthrough on how our own engine calculates the results of an experiment: :point_down:
<http://mkt.croct.link/rre>

attachments.fallback: Croct Blog: How Croct's AB testing engine works
attachments.text: In this last post of the series, we'll take a closer look at how Croct's AB testing engine works, covering the most relevant factors in declaring a winner variant.
attachments.title: How Croct's AB testing engine works
